docblock.description: Easy controller, calls the modules in the controller subdirectory and the associated functions inside, based on the URL.
docblock.long-description: As example: http://.../controller/test/info/... Calls module test and function info defined in test. Controller provides already configuration and logger class.

Function: Destroys an existing session
Function: Close an existing session

docblock.long-description: Used to use various backends for authentication, like LDAP. Per default it points to MySQL DB based authentication.

docblock.description: Tinystats, provides some statistics from the TinyStack setup
TinyStack statistics class.
Testfunction, which dumps all keys from TinyStack's Redis server.
Redis accessiability class
Redis access class We leverage for connectivity to Redis (http://redis.io/) the phpRedis software (https://github.com/nicolasff/phpredis/blob/master/README.markdown).
General redis object to work on
Redis Class default constructor, checks if extension is available and connects to Redis server.
Redis de-structor, disconnects from Redis server and destroys class
Redis connect - Connects to Redis server.
Redis disconnect - Closes connection to Redis server.
Redis getkeys() - Retrieves a list of keys, based on keyname or a placeholder
MySQL Database access
Mysql Database access class
Default public MYSQL object to work with
Default constructor, initiates DB connection
Default de-constructor, closing DB connection
Function: connect - creates connection to MySQL DB.
Function: disconnect - Disconnects from MySQL DB
Function: query - queries MySQL DB and returns, depending on the SQL command a resultset as an string, array or boolean.

docblock.description: Logging, implements general log and if enabled, audit log functionality.

docblock.description: Function: audit, provides auditing into a file.
docblock.long-description: Should be used to log user interactions
